20101205030033.000|20101205030035.000|CCO|GETS.

20101205030037.000|20101205030039.000|CCO|OVERCOME 1969.

20101205030041.000|20101205030043.000|CCO|GROUP ON A ROOF TOP IN LONDON.
20101205030043.000|20101205030045.000|CCO|>> THERE WAS SO MUCH PREJUDICE 
20101205030045.000|20101205030047.000|CCO|AGAINST YOKO AND ANGER TOWARDS 
20101205030047.000|20101205030049.000|CCO|HIM THAT HE HAD LEFT THE 
20101205030049.000|20101205030051.000|CCO|BEATLES.

20101205030054.333|20101205030057.667|CCO|RELATIONSHIP.
20101205030057.667|20101205030101.000|CCO|>> THE THING THAT HAD FINALLY 
20101205030101.000|20101205030106.000|CCO|GIVEN HIM PEACE, BEING MARRIED 
20101205030106.000|20101205030111.000|CCO|AND A FATHER.
20101205030111.000|20101205030121.000|CCO|6
20101205030121.000|20101205030123.000|CCO|>> Reporter: ALMOST 30 YEARS AGO
20101205030123.000|20101205030125.000|CCO|TO THE DAY JOHN LENNON WAS 
20101205030125.000|20101205030127.000|CCO|KILLED HERE AT THE APARTMENT 
20101205030127.000|20101205030129.000|CCO|BUILDING IN NEW YORK CITY, BUT 
20101205030129.000|20101205030131.000|CCO|BEFORE HE WAS CUT DOWN THE CITY 
20101205030131.000|20101205030134.667|CCO|THAT HE LOVED PROVIDED A NEW 
20101205030134.667|20101205030138.333|CCO|INSPIRATION FOR A NEW CHAPTER IN
20101205030138.333|20101205030142.000|CCO|HIS LIFE, AND A CHAPTER THAT 
20101205030142.000|20101205030152.000|CCO|HELPED HIM ESCAPE, A GROWING 
20101205030152.000|20101205030201.000|CCO|BURDEN OF BEING A BEATLE.
20101205030201.000|20101205030203.000|CCO|>> THE CONTRIBUTING EDITOR FROM 
20101205030203.000|20101205030205.000|CCO|"ROLLING STONE" MAGAZINE 
20101205030205.000|20101205030207.000|CCO|REMEMBERS.
20101205030207.000|20101205030209.000|CCO|>> THERE WAS A HYSTERIA TO THEIR
20101205030209.000|20101205030211.000|CCO|ARRIVAL HERE.
20101205030211.000|20101205030214.333|CCO|PEOPLE MAKE THE CONNECTION SO 
20101205030214.333|20101205030217.667|CCO|SOON AFTER THE KENNEDY 
20101205030217.667|20101205030221.000|CCO|ASSASSINATION.
20101205030221.000|20101205030224.333|CCO|>> Reporter: TWO DAYS LATER, AN 
20101205030224.333|20101205030227.667|CCO|EXPLOSIVE PERFORMANCE ON "THE ED
20101205030227.667|20101205030231.000|CCO|SULLIVAN SHOW."
20101205030231.000|20101205030233.500|CCO|LENNON FELL IN LOVE.
20101205030233.500|20101205030236.000|CCO|>> HE EMBRACED NEW YORK AND NEW 
20101205030236.000|20101205030238.500|CCO|YORK VERY MUCH EMBRACED HIM.
20101205030238.500|20101205030241.000|CCO|>> Reporter: JOHN LENNON WAS 
20101205030241.000|20101205030243.500|CCO|LIVING IN ENGLAND DURING THE 
20101205030243.500|20101205030246.000|CCO|HEIGHT OF THE BEATLES SUPERSTAR 
20101205030246.000|20101205030248.500|CCO|DUMB.
20101205030248.500|20101205030251.000|CCO|BUT A CHANCE MEETING WOULD BRING
20101205030251.000|20101205030253.000|CCO|HIM BACK TO THE CITY HE LOVED 
20101205030253.000|20101205030255.000|CCO|WHEN HE WALK INTO THE A LONDON 
20101205030255.000|20101205030257.000|CCO|ART GALLERY.
20101205030257.000|20101205030259.000|CCO|>> IT WAS A VERY HIP PLACE.
20101205030259.000|20101205030301.000|CCO|SO THE OWNER OF THE GALLERY 
20101205030301.000|20101205030304.333|CCO|BROUGHT LENNON BY WHILE YOKO WAS
20101205030304.333|20101205030307.667|CCO|SETTING UP HIS EXHIBITION.
20101205030307.667|20101205030311.000|CCO|>> HE WAS STILL MARRIED TO HIS 
20101205030311.000|20101205030314.333|CCO|FIRST WIFE AT THE TIME.
20101205030314.333|20101205030317.667|CCO|>> IT WAS NOT WHAT HE SAW AS HIS
20101205030317.667|20101205030321.000|CCO|DESTINY, AND WHEN YOKO ENTERED 
20101205030321.000|20101205030322.429|CCO|IT WAS LIKE A WIND BLOWING 
20101205030322.429|20101205030323.857|CCO|THROUGH.
20101205030323.857|20101205030325.286|CCO|>> PAUL AND I TURNED OUT A LONG 
20101205030325.286|20101205030326.714|CCO|OF SONGS THOSE DAYS, AND IT WAS 
20101205030326.714|20101205030328.143|CCO|EASIER BECAUSE IT WAS THE 
20101205030328.143|20101205030329.571|CCO|BEGINNING OF OUR RELATIONSHIP 
20101205030329.571|20101205030331.000|CCO|AND CAREER.
20101205030331.000|20101205030333.000|CCO|BUT THEN IT GOT TO BE FORMAT, 
20101205030333.000|20101205030335.000|CCO|AND SORT OF NOT THE PLEASURE 
20101205030335.000|20101205030337.000|CCO|THAT IT WAS, AND THAT'S WHAT I 
20101205030337.000|20101205030339.000|CCO|FELT THAT I'D LOST MYSELF.
20101205030339.000|20101205030341.000|CCO|>> I THINK HE WAS LOOKING FOR 
20101205030341.000|20101205030343.000|CCO|SOMETHING BEYOND THE BEATLES, 
20101205030343.000|20101205030345.000|CCO|AND TO MEET SOMEBODY LIKE YOKO, 
20101205030345.000|20101205030347.000|CCO|IT OPENED DOORS TO HIM, I THINK,
20101205030347.000|20101205030349.000|CCO|IN HIS HEART AND ALSO 
20101205030349.000|20101205030351.000|CCO|IMAGINATIVELY FOR A NEW 
20101205030351.000|20101205030353.000|CCO|DIRECTION HE MIGHT WANT TO GO 
20101205030353.000|20101205030355.000|CCO|IN.
20101205030355.000|20101205030357.000|CCO|>> BUT THE PUBLIC WAS NOT READY 
20101205030357.000|20101205030359.000|CCO|FOR A NEW DIRECTION, OR FOR JOHN
20101205030359.000|20101205030401.000|CCO|AND YOKO.
20101205030401.000|20101205030403.000|CCO|>> THE FACT THAT HE WAS A WOMAN,
20101205030403.000|20101205030405.000|CCO|JAPANESE, AND AN ARTIST, AND 
20101205030405.000|20101205030407.000|CCO|THESE WERE NOT PASSPORTS TO 
20101205030407.000|20101205030409.000|CCO|ACCEPTANCE AMONG THE BRITISH 
20101205030409.000|20101205030411.000|CCO|PUBLIC.
20101205030411.000|20101205030413.500|CCO|>> THE COUPLE NEEDED TO ESCAPE 
20101205030413.500|20101205030416.000|CCO|THE CONSTANT CRITICISM.
20101205030416.000|20101205030418.500|CCO|THEY FLED FROM LONDON TO THE 
20101205030418.500|20101205030421.000|CCO|SAFETY OF NEW YORK CITY IN 1971.
20101205030421.000|20101205030423.500|CCO|>> JOHN SAID HE FELT IT WAS THE 
20101205030423.500|20101205030426.000|CCO|CENTER OF THE WORLD.
20101205030426.000|20101205030428.500|CCO|>> OVER THE YEARS, HE BECAME A 
20101205030428.500|20101205030431.000|CCO|CLOSE FRIEND AND HIS PERSONAL 
20101205030431.000|20101205030433.500|CCO|PHOTOGRAPHER.
20101205030433.500|20101205030436.000|CCO|>> IT WAS THE EARLY ENGLISH 
20101205030436.000|20101205030438.500|CCO|SETTLEMENT, AND THIS WAS MORE OF
20101205030438.500|20101205030441.000|CCO|THE ENGLISH SIDE, AND SO JOHN 
20101205030441.000|20101205030442.667|CCO|AND YOKO FELT MORE COMFORTABLE.
20101205030442.667|20101205030444.333|CCO|BECAUSE IT HAS AN ENGLISH FEEL 
20101205030444.333|20101205030446.000|CCO|AND SMALL BUILDING.
20101205030446.000|20101205030447.667|CCO|>> STRANGE TO THINK THAT JOHN 
20101205030447.667|20101205030449.333|CCO|LENNON WAS LIVING RIGHT HERE.
20101205030449.333|20101205030451.000|CCO|>> YEAH.
20101205030451.000|20101205030453.000|CCO|>> HE WAS TRYING TO BE A MORE 
20101205030453.000|20101205030455.000|CCO|NORMAL PERSON.
20101205030455.000|20101205030457.000|CCO|WHERE HE COULD GO OUTSIDE AND 
20101205030457.000|20101205030459.000|CCO|WALK DOWN THE BLOCK AND GET A 
20101205030459.000|20101205030501.000|CCO|CUP OF COFFEE LIKE A REGULAR 
20101205030501.000|20101205030502.667|CCO|GUY, AND HE COULD DO THAT IN NEW
20101205030502.667|20101205030504.333|CCO|YORK.
20101205030504.333|20101205030506.000|CCO|>> THINGS WERE ABOUT TO GET 
20101205030506.000|20101205030507.667|CCO|RUCKY.
20101205030507.667|20101205030509.333|CCO|>> PEOPLE STARTED FINDING OUT 
20101205030509.333|20101205030511.000|CCO|THAT THEY WERE THERE, AND PEOPLE
20101205030511.000|20101205030513.500|CCO|WOULD SHOW UP AND RING A 
20101205030513.500|20101205030516.000|CCO|DOORBELL.
20101205030516.000|20101205030518.500|CCO|AND THERE WAS AN FBI AGENT 
20101205030518.500|20101205030521.000|CCO|STANDING ACROSS THE STREET FOR A
20101205030521.000|20101205030523.500|CCO|WHILE.
20101205030523.500|20101205030526.000|CCO|>> THERE WAS FEAR ON NIXON'S 
20101205030526.000|20101205030528.500|CCO|PART THAT THERE WAS GOING TO BE 
20101205030528.500|20101205030531.000|CCO|AN ORGANIZED PROTEST AT THE 
20101205030531.000|20101205030533.500|CCO|REPUBLICAN CONVENTION IN 1972, 
20101205030533.500|20101205030536.000|CCO|AND THAT LENNON WAS GOING TO BE 
20101205030536.000|20101205030538.500|CCO|ONE OF ITS LEADERS.
20101205030538.500|20101205030541.000|CCO|>> OFFICIALS IN THE NIXON 
20101205030541.000|20101205030543.500|CCO|ADMINISTRATION LAUNCHED A 
20101205030543.500|20101205030546.000|CCO|CAMPAIGN TO DEPORT THE STAR 
20101205030546.000|20101205030548.500|CCO|BECAUSE OF THE RUMORS, USING AN 
20101205030548.500|20101205030551.000|CCO|OLD MARIJUANA CHARGE.
20101205030551.000|20101205030553.000|CCO|>> THEY FOUND HIS NAME ON THE 
20101205030553.000|20101205030555.000|CCO|LIST QUITE A LOT.
20101205030555.000|20101205030557.000|CCO|>> LENNON FOUGHT HIS DEPORTATION
20101205030557.000|20101205030559.000|CCO|LEGALLY AND IN THE COURT OF 
20101205030559.000|20101205030601.000|CCO|PUBLIC OPINION.
20101205030601.000|20101205030604.333|CCO|>> I FELT THE STATUE OF LIBERTY 
20101205030604.333|20101205030607.667|CCO|WAS A GOOD SYMBOL OF WELCOMING 
20101205030607.667|20101205030611.000|CCO|PEOPLE, AND I SUGGESTED JOHN GO 
20101205030611.000|20101205030614.333|CCO|THERE AND TAKE A PICTURE OF HIM 
20101205030614.333|20101205030617.667|CCO|WITH THE STATUE OF LIBERTY.
20101205030617.667|20101205030621.000|CCO|EVENTUALLY HE WAS GRANTED 
20101205030621.000|20101205030622.667|CCO|PERMISSION TO STAY, BUT THE 
20101205030622.667|20101205030624.333|CCO|BATTLE TOOK ITS TOLL.
20101205030624.333|20101205030626.000|CCO|>> IT LASTED FOR A FEW YEARS AND
20101205030626.000|20101205030627.667|CCO|IT SCARED HIM.
20101205030627.667|20101205030629.333|CCO|HIS PHONE WAS TAPPED AND HE WAS 
20101205030629.333|20101205030631.000|CCO|BEING FOLLOWED AND THERE WERE 
20101205030631.000|20101205030636.000|CCO|ALL KINDS OF THINGS ALONG THOSE 
20101205030636.000|20101205030641.000|CCO|LINGZ.
20101205030641.000|20101205030644.333|CCO|>> HE RELEASED "SOMETIME" WHICH 
20101205030644.333|20101205030647.667|CCO|WAS AGGRESSIVE.
20101205030647.667|20101205030651.000|CCO|LENNON HAD A NEW IDENTITY.
20101205030651.000|20101205030652.667|CCO|BEHIND THE PUBLIC FACADE, THERE 
20101205030652.667|20101205030654.333|CCO|WAS TROUBLE.

20101205030656.000|20101205030657.667|CCO|FALL.
